TopicTitle: Custom biomes default biomes are mirror imaged from actual terrain features

Articles.Content:
I've noticed that while Kerbin, Mun, and Minmus are fine, the other planets and moons have their custom default biomes mirror imaged and maybe offset from the actual terrain features, especially noticeable with Laythe. Anybody know how to fix this?

Windows 8.1 64x

KSP 0.90 (running 32x)

Mods:

KAS

FAR

B9 Aerospace suite

MechJeb plus extension for FAR

Procedural fairings

ATM

SCANsat

betterbuoyancy

Nereids SAVE backup

Universial storage

Stock Bug fix modules

Techmanager

Community Tech tree

Dmagic Orbital Science

Hangar (not hangar extension)

custom biomes
I believe this has been covered recently in the thread. The way biome textures need to be made changed in .90.
